data.text: Mangɛ Sulemani naxa ginɛ gbegbe dɔxɔ naxee mu findixi Isirayilakae ra, alɔ Firawuna xa di ginɛ, Mowaba ginɛe, Amoni ginɛe, Edon ginɛe, Sidɔn ginɛe, nun Xiti ginɛe.

Alatala nu bara a fala Isirayilakae bɛ na sie xa fe ra, «Wo naxa siga e xɔnyi, e fan naxa fa wo xɔnyi. Xa na mu, e wo bɔɲɛe ya rafindima nɛ e xa alae mabiri.» Kɔnɔ Sulemani tan bira na mixie nan fɔxɔ ra, ginɛe maxanufe ra.
A mangɛ di ginɛ kɛmɛ solofere nan dɔxɔ, a konyi ginɛ kɛmɛ saxan fan tongo. Na ginɛe naxa a bɔɲɛ mafindi.
A to fori, na ginɛe nu bara a bɔɲɛ birin mafindi ala gbɛtɛe ma, a mu bira a Marigi Alatala fɔxɔ ra alɔ a baba Dawuda.
Mangɛ Sulemani nu Sidɔnkae xa ala Asiteroti nun Amonikae xa ala Mɔlɔkɔ fan batuma.
Mangɛ Sulemani naxa fe raba, naxan mu rafan Alatala ma, a mu a xui rakamali Alatala bɛ alɔ a baba Dawuda.
Na kui Sulemani naxa sɛrɛxɛbade yailan Mowaba xa ala Kemosi bɛ, a nun Amonikae xa ala Mɔlɔkɔ bɛ geya fari, naxan nu na Darisalamu ya ra.
A nu na mɔɔli rabama a xa ginɛe birin bɛ, naxee nu fatanxi si gbɛtɛe ra, naxee nu surayi nun sɛrɛxɛe bama e xa alae bɛ.
Alatala naxa xɔnɔ mangɛ Sulemani ma, barima a nu bara a kobe so Isirayila Marigi Alatala ra, naxan mini a ma sanya firin.
Alatala nu bara tɔnyi dɔxɔ ala gbɛtɛ batufe ra, kɔnɔ Sulemani mu Alatala xa yaamari suxu.

Na kui Alatala naxa a fala Sulemani bɛ, «I to bara na mɔɔli raba, i mu bira n ma yaamarie fɔxɔ ra n naxee birin masen i bɛ, i n ma saatɛ kana, n i xa mangɛya bama nɛ i yi ra, n fa a so i xa konyi nde yi ra.
Kɔnɔ i baba Dawuda xa fe ra, n mu na rabama i xa simaya kui, n mangɛya bama nɛ i xa di xɛmɛ yi ra.
N mu mangɛya birin bama a yi ra, n bɔnsɔɛ keren nan luma i xa di bɛ n ma konyi Dawuda xa fe ra, nun Darisalamu xa fe ra n naxan sugandixi.»
Alatala naxa Sulemani gerefa nde ramini, naxan nu xili Hadada. Edon mangɛ xa di nan nu a ra.
Dawuda Edon bɔxi gere tɛmui naxɛ, a xa sɔɔri mangɛ Yowaba nu bara te naa Isirayila sɔɔrie furee ragatade. Na tɛmui a man naxa Edon xɛmɛ birin faxa.
Yowaba nun a xa sɔɔrie naxa lu naa kike senni, han e gɛ xɛmɛ birin faxade
Hadada nun a baba xa konyi Edonka ndee nu bara e gi, e siga Misira. Na raba Hadada dimɛdi tɛmui nɛ.
E to keli Madiyan, e naxa siga Paran. E naxa mixie tongo mɛnni, e fa siga Misira Firawuna yire. Misira mangɛ naxa banxi so a yi ra, a a ɲɔxɔ sa a xa donse fe xɔn ma, a bɔxi fan fi a ma.
Hadada naxa rafan Firawuna ma, han a a xa mangɛ ginɛ xunya fi a ma ginɛ ra.
Mangɛ ginɛ Tapenesi xunya naxa di xɛmɛ bari a bɛ, naxan nu xili Genubati. Tapenesi na dɛ ba Firawuna xɔnyi nɛ, a fa lu mɛnni Firawuna xa die ya ma.
Hadada to a mɛ a Dawuda nun a xa sɔɔri mangɛ Yowaba bara faxa, a naxa a fala Firawuna bɛ, a xa diɲɛ a ma a xa gbilen a xɔnyi.
Firawuna naxa a yaabi, «Munfe ra i wama gbilenfe i xɔnyi? I waxɔnfe birin na be.» A naxa a yaabi, «I nɔndi, kɔnɔ diɲɛ n xa gbilen.»
Ala naxa gerefa gbɛtɛ ramini mangɛ Sulemani bɛ, naxan findixi Eliyada xa di Reson na, naxan nu bara a gi kelife Soba mangɛ Hadadeseri xɔnyi,
Dawuda nu na e gerefe tɛmui naxɛ. Reson xa sɔɔrie nan malan a fɛ ma, e fa lu Damasi, e mangɛya sɔtɔ mɛnni.
Reson nun Hadada findi Sulemani yaxuie nan na a xa simaya birin kui. Arami mangɛ Reson nu Isirayila ɲama xɔnxi.
Nebati xa di Yerobowami nu kelixi Sereda nɛ Efirami bɔxi ma. A nga naxa findi kaaɲɛ ginɛ nde ra, naxan xili Seruya. A nu walima mangɛ Sulemani xa mixie ya ma, kɔnɔ mangɛ xa fe mu nu rafan a ma.
Na rakeli yi fe nan ma: Mangɛ Sulemani nu na Milo tife, a nun a baba xa taa tɛtɛ yire nde.
Yerobowami to findi gbangbalanyi fanyi nan na, Sulemani naxa a findi teku wali xunyi ra Yusufu bɔnsɔɛ xun ma.
Lɔxɔɛ nde Yerobowami naxa mini Darisalamu, a Annabi Ahiya Siloka li kira xɔn ma e doro. Donma xungbe nɛɛnɛ nu ragoroxi namiɲɔnmɛ ma.
Annabi Ahiya naxa a xa donma nɛɛnɛ ibɔɔ xuntun fu nun firin na,
a fa a fala Yerobowami bɛ, «Xuntun fu tongo, barima Isirayila Marigi Alatala yi nan masenxi n bɛ, ‹N fama nɛ mangɛya bade Sulemani yi ra, n fa bɔnsɔɛ fu sa i tan xa yaamari bun ma.
N bɔnsɔɛ keren luma nɛ Sulemani bun ma n ma konyi Dawuda xa fe ra nun Darisalamu xa fe ra, n taa naxan sugandixi Isirayila bɔnsɔɛ ya ma.

N na rabama nɛ barima e bara e kobe so n na, e Sidɔn xa ala Asiteroti, nun Mowaba xa ala Kemosi, nun Amoni xa ala Mɔlɔkɔ batu. E mu e ɲɛrɛma n ma kira xɔn ma, e mu n ma yaamarie ratinmɛma alɔ Sulemani baba Dawuda a raba nɛ ki naxɛ.
N mu mangɛya birin bama Sulemani yi ra, a xa lu mangɛya kui a xa simaya birin na n ma konyi sugandixi Dawuda xa fe ra, naxan bara n ma yaamarie nun n waxɔnfe rabatu.
Kɔnɔ n mangɛya bama nɛ Dawuda xa di Sulemani yi ra, n bɔnsɔɛ fu fi i ma.
N bɔnsɔɛ keren nan luma a xa di yi ra, alako n ma konyi Dawuda fɔxi xa lu Darisalamu abadan, n dɛnnaxɛ sugandixi n xili xa fe ra.
N i tongoma nɛ, n i findi mangɛ ra Isirayila xun na. I luma i waxɔnde nɛ.

Xa i sa i tuli mati n na, xa i sa i ɲɛrɛ n ma kira xɔn, xa i sa wali n bɛ, i n ma yaamarie ratinmɛ, i n ma sɛriyɛ rabatu, alɔ n ma konyi Dawuda a raba ki naxɛ, n luma nɛ i sɛɛti ma tɛmui birin, n i bɔnsɔɛ rasabatima nɛ, alɔ n naxan nabaxi n ma konyi mangɛ Dawuda bɛ, n Isirayila fima nɛ i ma.
N mangɛ Dawuda bɔnsɔɛe rayaagima nɛ, kɔnɔ kudɛ xa mu a ra.›»
Mangɛ Sulemani naxa wa Yerobowami faxafe. Na nan a niya, Yerobowami naxa a gi, a sa a xunyi taxu Sisaki ra Misira mangɛ. A naxa lu mɛnni han mangɛ Sulemani naxa faxa.
Sulemani xa taruxui dɔnxɔɛ, a fɔlɛ nun a raɲɔnyi, a sɛbɛxi Sulemani xa taruxui kui.
Sulemani xa mangɛya naxa bu ɲɛ tongo naani Darisalamu nun Isirayila xun ma.
Na xanbi, Sulemani naxa laaxira. E naxa a ragata a babae sɛɛti ma a baba Dawuda xa taa kui. A xa di Robowami naxa lu a ɲɔxɔɛ ra.
